channel.title: CVE Feed for Lenovo -- Power Management Driver for Windows 10
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Lenovo -- Power Management Driver for Windows 10

item.title: CVE-2021-3463|2024-08-03T16:53:17.802Z -- lenovo -- power%20management%20driver%20for%20windows%2010
item.description: A null pointer dereference vulnerability in Lenovo Power Management Driver for Windows 10, prior to version 1.67.17.54, that could cause systems to experience a blue screen error.

item.title: CVE-2021-3462|2024-08-03T16:53:17.876Z -- lenovo -- power%20management%20driver%20for%20windows%2010
item.description: A privilege escalation vulnerability in Lenovo Power Management Driver for Windows 10, prior to version 1.67.17.54, that could allow unauthorized access to the driver's device object.
